name: A Dice Meal
description:
A Dice Meal is about serving die-sized dishes in a chill restaurant.

Move the pan with your mouse and flip the dice around to change their values. Complete as many orders as you can in a limited time and try to reach for the high score!

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 with the theme “Roll of the dice”, by 5 students of the Cnam-ENJMIN.

Controls

Move the mouse around to move the pan accordingly.

Credits
  • Voice: Léo
  • Music: 1 (Jazz) and Lucid Dreaming by HoliznaCC0, remixed by Charlie
  • Level Design: Léo
  • Game Design: the whole team
  • Modeling, texturing: Geegaz
  • Code: Alex, Danny and Geegaz
  • Third-party assets:
    • wood1.jpg is from JCW (CC0)
    • wood4.png is from Luke.RUSTLTD (CC0)
    • Sounds effects: Joseph Sardin
